price: (Rántí) nígbà tí Mo fi mọ àwọn ọmọlẹ́yìn rẹ¹ nínú ọkàn wọn pé kí wọ́n gbàgbọ́ nínú Èmi àti Òjíṣẹ́ Mi. Wọ́n sọ pé: “A gbàgbọ́. Kí o sì jẹ́rìí pé dájúdájú mùsùlùmí ni wá.”
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡتُ إِلَى ٱلۡحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِي وَبِرَسُولِي قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَٱشۡهَدۡ بِأَنَّنَا مُسۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: 1. “Hawāriyyūn” túmọ̀ sí àwọn ọmọlẹ́yìn. Ipò tí àwọn Sọhābah àti Ansọ̄r wà sí Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - ni ipò tí àwọn hawāriyyūn wà sí Ànábì ‘Īsā ọmọ Mọryam - kí ọlà Allāhu máa bá a -. Nítorí náà, àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ náà túmọ̀ ara wọn.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh awḥaytu ilā al-ḥawāriyīna an āminū bī wabirasūlī qālū āmannā wa-ish'had bi-annanā mus'limūna
